examples.example: 这颗钻石虽然只有一克重，但却无比珍贵。

translate.english: Although this diamond is only one gram in weight, it is extremely precious.

examples.example: 我今天买了一克黄金，准备用来打造一个漂亮的饰品。

translate.english: I bought one gram of gold today and am going to use it to make a beautiful accessory.

examples.example: 我在厨房小心翼翼地称出一克盐，放进了美味的菜肴中。

translate.english: I carefully weighed out one gram of salt in the kitchen and put it into the delicious dish.
